description:
Ubuntu 19.04, this works as described.

please note that the icon does not appear unless there is something in the trash.

I would like to see an option in the future that allows me to toggle the icon to 'always on' even if the trash is empty.
summary: Does what it says on the tin

description:
Thank you very much for this awesome and very handy extension.
The extension serves well but the "trash" icon isn't at the "desktop screen" as opposed to the preview snapshot.
The icon is being accessible through "Files" app.
summary: Works with Gnome and Fedora31 but the top "trash" icon is missing

description: Agree with the the other review, would be good if the icon remains also when the trash is empty. Otherwise very nice, thanks!
summary: Perfect, just icon disappears when trash is empty
